2.0.name: wordpress/aviary-image-editor-add-on-for-gravity-forms
2.0.description:
Allow your users to upload and edit photos before submitting them in your Gravity Forms. Now get photos from facebook and instagram too!

Using the Aviary Editor API

Before you can start using this great plugin, you'll need to get a developer api key from Get your api key here for free!.

Don't have Gravity Forms for your site?

Gravity Forms is required for this plugin to function correctly, Get Gravity Forms Here!
